cities.name: New York City
cities.description: Skyscraper-packed cultural capital known for Broadway, museums, and diverse neighborhoods.

cities.name: London
cities.description: Historic yet modern hub with royal landmarks, West End theatres, and riverside walks.

cities.name: Paris
cities.description: Romantic boulevards, world-class art, and café culture centered around the Seine.

cities.name: Tokyo
cities.description: Neon-soaked megacity blending tradition, tech, and unmatched food scenes.

cities.name: Dubai
cities.description: Futuristic desert metropolis famed for luxury shopping, skyscrapers, and beaches.

cities.name: Singapore
cities.description: Clean, green city-state with hawker food, gardens, and efficient transit.

cities.name: Bangkok
cities.description: Vibrant street life, ornate temples, and legendary street food.

cities.name: Rome
cities.description: Ancient ruins and Renaissance art set amid lively piazzas and trattorias.

cities.name: Barcelona
cities.description: Gaudí architecture, beaches, and late-night tapas culture.

cities.name: Sydney
cities.description: Harbour city with iconic sails, beaches, and cafés.
